text: sillo geudaeege chungseonghal geos-eulmaengsehan ja hananimkke chungseonghaneun geos gwa daleul ba eobsnani hananim-ui son i geudeul-wie issnola geuhu geuui maengseleul kkaetteulin janeun seuseuloui yeong hon-eul haechineun geos-ila geuleona hana nimkkeseoneun hananimgwa seong-yaghan geos-eul suhaenghan ja-ege god keun bosang-eul jusilila
